main event: A woman observed a bright white object moving slowly and erratically in Smyrna, Georgia on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted from 23:22 to 23:43 EST., The object was seen by 2 additional witnesses., Various conclusions were drawn about the object, including it being a balloon or aircraft., The report was part of Project Blue Book, which studied UFO sightings., Weather conditions included scattered clouds and good visibility.
